item.title: Report X-2024010429
item.description:
Report X-2024010429

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE FLOOR WITH THE CORNERS OF THE PACKAGE WET. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS, PACKAGE WAS SECURED BY RESPONDER AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED

item.title: Report E-2024010364
item.description:
Report E-2024010364

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported a spill of about 2 quarts of Thixon OSN-2-EF (UN1133) out of one 50gal metal drum which was punctured by a forklift, causing the release to the dock floor. The SDS for the product was reviewed with the terminal and determined that the spill could safely be cleaned by the terminal staff. The waste was collected into one 100gal metal overpack drum and left onsite for the terminal to manage.
